description.value:
• Automatically achieve 4 successes (critical effect)
    • No Energy cost
    • No action cost (can cast as [Free] action)
    • Must be a weave you've cast before

system.benefits:
Once per long rest, you can cast one weave at maximum possible effect without rolling:

  • Automatically achieve 4 successes (critical effect)
  • No Energy cost
  • No action cost (can cast as [Free] action)
  • Must be a weave you've cast before
